idsDocument.name: GuarantorAccount
idsDocument.elementOrder: AccountType, AccountActive, AccountOpenDate, AccountName, AccountCloseDate, Guarantor, ReferringProvider, ServiceArea, FinancialClass, BillinCycle, FollowupCycleForOverdue, BillingStatus, TotalOutstandingBalance, InsuranceBalance, PatientBalance, UndistributedPayments, LastInsurancePaymentDate, LastInsurancePaymentAmount, LastPatientPaymentDate, LastPatientPaymentAmount, NextStatementDate, LastNonDemandEnterpriseStatementDate, LastDemandEnterpriseStatementDate, LastNonDemandEnterpriseGeneratedStatementDate, LastDemandEnterpriseGeneratedStatementDate, PricingContractId, PricingContractExpireDate, HasCreditBalance, BadDebtBalance, ExternalBadDebtSelfPayBalance, ExternalBadDebtInsuranceBalance, HospitalAccountRecordId, GuarantorRehomed, DistrictCategoryOfAccountAddress, OldGuarantorId, GuarantorPatient, ReimbursementContractId, IncomeSource, QuickDisclosureActivity, PrePayOnlyRequester, ConfidentialNameOfPatient, HospitalBilling, ClientBilling, ProfessionalBilling, PaymentPlan, ReleaseOfInformation, Notes, ContactHistory, Coverages, Transactions, CollectorUser

changeLog.change: Removed any references to SourceCode and replaced with SourceCode
Added SourceStatusCode to instance and collection items.

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsDocument.documentation: Use this Input Specification to feed Guarantor Account information.

element.name: Guarantor
element.documentation: Use this element to define the person who will guarantee this account.

idsSpecification.name: GuarantorAccountPerson
idsSpecification.elementOrder: Name, Gender, DateOfBirth, SocialSecurityNumber, HomePhoneNumber, WorkPhoneNumber, Address, OccupationDescription, Occupation, EmploymentStatus, EmploymentStartDate, IncomeSource, PreferredLanguage, VerificationId, VerificationUser, VerificationStatus, NextAccountReviewDate, NextReviewDate, Employers, OthersGuaranteed, PatientsGuaranteed

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Guarantor Person Information.

group.name: Name
group.elementOrder: FullName, Prefix, FirstName, MiddleName, LastName, Suffix, Title

element.name: FullName
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the full name of the Person if the source system does not contain the individual component fields. If this field is being used please do not use the component fields.

element.name: Prefix
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the prefix for the Patient's name. (e.g., Dr., Mr, Ms.)

element.name: FirstName
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the person last name.

element.name: MiddleName
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the person middle name or middle initial.

element.name: LastName
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the person last name.

element.name: Suffix
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the person name suffix. (e.g., Jr. or III)

element.name: Title
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the person's title.

element.name: Gender
element.documentation: Guarantor's Sex

element.name: DateOfBirth
element.documentation: Guarantor's Date of Birth

element.name: SocialSecurityNumber
element.documentation: Guarantor SSN

element.name: HomePhoneNumber
element.documentation: Guarantor Home Phone

element.name: WorkPhoneNumber
element.documentation: Guarantor Work Phone

group.name: Address
group.elementOrder: AddressLine1, AddressLine2, AddressLine3, AddressLine4, City, StateProvince, PostalCode, Country, CountyRegion

element.name: AddressLine1
element.documentation: This field specifies the street or mailing address of a person or institution. When referencing an institution, this first component is used to specify the institution name. When used in connection with a person, this component specifies the first line of the address.

element.name: AddressLine2
element.documentation: This field specifies the second line of address. In general, it qualifies address. Examples: Suite 555 or Fourth Floor. When referencing an institution, this component specifies the street address.

element.name: AddressLine3
element.documentation: This field specifies the name of the person or organization that should appear as part of the address. This is also known as the "Care of" or "C/O" line.

element.name: AddressLine4
element.documentation: This field specifies more address information.

element.name: City
element.documentation: This field specifies the city, district or place where the addressee is located depending upon the national convention for formatting addresses for postal usage.

element.name: StateProvince
element.documentation: This field specifies the state or province where the addressee is located. State or province should be represented by the official postal service codes for that country.

element.name: PostalCode
element.documentation: This component specifies the zip or postal code where the addressee is located. Zip or postal codes should be represented by the official codes for that country. In the US, the zip code takes the form 99999[-9999], while the Canadian postal code takes the form A9A9A9 and the Australian Postcode takes the form 9999.

element.name: Country
element.documentation: This component specifies the country where the addressee is located. HL7 specifies that the 3-character (alphabetic) form of ISO 3166 be used for the country code.

element.name: CountyRegion
element.documentation: This component specifies the county where the addressee is located when applicable.

element.name: OccupationDescription
element.documentation: Occupation of the Guarantor

element.name: Occupation
element.documentation: Occupation of the Guarantor

element.name: EmploymentStatus
element.documentation: Guarantor's employment Status

element.name: IncomeSource
element.documentation: Income source

element.name: PreferredLanguage
element.documentation: Perferred Language of the Guarantor

element.name: VerificationId
element.documentation: Verification record of the Guarantor

element.name: VerificationUser
element.documentation: Last user who verified this Guarantor

element.name: VerificationStatus
element.documentation: Guarantor Verification Status

element.name: NextAccountReviewDate
element.documentation: Next review date this Guarantor Account should be reviewed

element.name: NextReviewDate
element.documentation: Next review date this Guarantor Account should be reviewd

element.name: CoveragePlan
element.documentation: Coverage ID links to this Guarantor Account

list.name: Employers
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify employers of the Person (Guarantor) responsible for the Guarantor Account.

idsSpecification.name: GuarantorAccountPersonEmployer
idsSpecification.elementOrder: EmployerId, EmployerName, ContactPerson, PhoneNumber, FaxNumber, Address, ContractId, AccountManager, Industry, Location, NumberOfEmployees

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Guarantor Person Information.

element.name: EmployerId
element.documentation: Employer ID associated with this Guarantor Account

element.name: EmployerName
element.documentation: Guarantor's employer name

element.name: ContactPerson
element.documentation: Employers contact person

element.name: PhoneNumber
element.documentation: Phone number of the Employer associated with this account

element.name: FaxNumber
element.documentation: Guarantor's employers fax

group.name: Address
group.elementOrder: AddressLine1, AddressLine2, AddressLine3, AddressLine4, City, StateProvince, PostalCode, Country, CountyRegion

element.name: AddressLine1
element.documentation: This field specifies the street or mailing address of a person or institution. When referencing an institution, this first component is used to specify the institution name. When used in connection with a person, this component specifies the first line of the address.

element.name: AddressLine2
element.documentation: This field specifies the second line of address. In general, it qualifies address. Examples: Suite 555 or Fourth Floor. When referencing an institution, this component specifies the street address.

element.name: AddressLine3
element.documentation: This field specifies the name of the person or organization that should appear as part of the address. This is also known as the "Care of" or "C/O" line.

element.name: AddressLine4
element.documentation: This field specifies more address information.

element.name: City
element.documentation: This field specifies the city, district or place where the addressee is located depending upon the national convention for formatting addresses for postal usage.

element.name: StateProvince
element.documentation: This field specifies the state or province where the addressee is located. State or province should be represented by the official postal service codes for that country.

element.name: PostalCode
element.documentation: This component specifies the zip or postal code where the addressee is located. Zip or postal codes should be represented by the official codes for that country. In the US, the zip code takes the form 99999[-9999], while the Canadian postal code takes the form A9A9A9 and the Australian Postcode takes the form 9999.

element.name: Country
element.documentation: This component specifies the country where the addressee is located. HL7 specifies that the 3-character (alphabetic) form of ISO 3166 be used for the country code.

element.name: CountyRegion
element.documentation: This component specifies the county where the addressee is located when applicable.

element.name: ContractId
element.documentation: Pricing contract set up with the employer

element.name: AccountManager
element.documentation: Staff person assigned to this employer

element.name: Industry
element.documentation: Employers Standard Industry Code

element.name: Location
element.documentation: Location of the Employer

element.name: NumberOfEmployees
element.documentation: Approx number of people employed with this employer

list.name: OthersGuaranteed
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify other people that the this Gurantor guarantees.

idsSpecification.name: GuarantorAccountGuaranteeOther

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Guarantor Person Information.

element.name: RelationToGuarantor
element.documentation: Relationship of Patient ID to this Guarantor Account

group.name: Name
group.elementOrder: FullName, Prefix, FirstName, MiddleName, LastName, Suffix, Title

element.name: Suffix
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the person name suffix. (e.g., Jr. or III)

element.name: Title
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the person's title.

list.name: PatientsGuaranteed
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify other patients that the this Gurantor guarantees.

idsSpecification.name: GuarantorAccountGuaranteePatient

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Guarantor Person Information.

element.name: RelationToGuarantor
element.documentation: Relationship of Patient ID to this Guarantor Account

element.name: RequisitionRelationship
element.documentation: Guarantor to Requisition Grouper Patient relationship (Aunt, Brother, Daugther, Son, Sister, etc.,)

element.name: AccountName
element.documentation: Guarantor Account Name

element.name: AccountActive
element.documentation: Guarantor account is active ?

element.name: AccountType
element.documentation: Guarantor Account type such as Personal, Family , Worker Compensation et

element.name: ReferringProvider
element.documentation: Referral Source of this account

element.name: ServiceArea
element.documentation: Service Area of this Account

element.name: FinancialClass
element.documentation: Financial Class of the account (like Self Pay, Medicare, Commerial, HMO etc)

element.name: TotalOutstandingBalance
element.documentation: Total Outstanding Balance as of now

element.name: InsuranceBalance
element.documentation: Insurance balance as of now

element.name: PatientBalance
element.documentation: Patient balance (Patient Responsibility) as of now

element.name: BillinCycle
element.documentation: Billing Cycle of the Account

element.name: FollowupCycleForOverdue
element.documentation: Followup Cycle for Over due notices to be sent

element.name: BillingStatus
element.documentation: Billing status used for Handling statement - like Age , hold, Age and send

element.name: LastInsurancePaymentDate
element.documentation: Most recent insurance payment received date

element.name: LastInsurancePaymentAmount
element.documentation: Most recent insurance payment amount

element.name: LastPatientPaymentDate
element.documentation: Most recent insurance payment amount

element.name: LastPatientPaymentAmount
element.documentation: Most recent Patient payment received amount

element.name: PricingContractId
element.documentation: Pricing contract ID set for the Guarantor Account

element.name: PricingContractExpireDate
element.documentation: Pricing contract expiriy date for this Guarantor Account

element.name: CollectorUser
element.documentation: Collector Assigned to this Account

element.name: UndistributedPayments
element.documentation: Account has any undistributed payment ?.

element.name: HasCreditBalance
element.documentation: Account has any Credit balance ?

element.name: BadDebtBalance
element.documentation: Value of the Bad Debt on this Account

element.name: LastNonDemandEnterpriseStatementDate
element.documentation: Last Non Demand Enterprise Statement Date

element.name: LastDemandEnterpriseStatementDate
element.documentation: Last demand enterprise statement date

element.name: HospitalAccountRecordId
element.documentation: Default hospital_account ID of the Guarantor. . .points to separate table ..that has accont_Id and Pat_id

element.name: LastNonDemandEnterpriseGeneratedStatementDate
element.documentation: Date of last non-demand enterprise statement generated

element.name: LastDemandEnterpriseGeneratedStatementDate
element.documentation: Date of last demand enterprise statement generated

element.name: GuarantorRehomed
element.documentation: new guarantor was created as a result of running the rehoming report and performing the rehome account action

element.name: DistrictCategoryOfAccountAddress
element.documentation: District catergory of Account Address. . . related to rehomed

element.name: OldGuarantorId
element.documentation: Old Guarantor ID

element.name: GuarantorPatient
element.documentation: Guarantor same person as the Patient - Patient ID of the Guarantor

element.name: NextStatementDate
element.documentation: Next statement date

element.name: ReimbursementContractId
element.documentation: Reimbursement Contract associated with this client

element.name: IncomeSource
element.documentation: Income source

element.name: QuickDisclosureActivity
element.documentation: Request can appear for quick disclosure acitivity ?

element.name: PrePayOnlyRequester
element.documentation: Pre Pay only requester ?

element.name: ConfidentialNameOfPatient
element.documentation: Confidential Name of the Patient

element.name: ExternalBadDebtSelfPayBalance
element.documentation: External Bad Debt Self Pay Balance

element.name: ExternalBadDebtInsuranceBalance
element.documentation: External Bad Debt Insurance Balance

group.name: HospitalBilling
group.elementOrder: Account, Balance, PreBilledBalance, InsuranceBalance, SelfPayBalance, BadDebtBalance, UndistributedBalance, BadDebtSelfPayBalance, BadDebtInsuranceBalance, BadDebtUndistributedBalance, SelfPayAgingDate, InsuranceAgingDate, LastInsurancePaymentDate, LastSelfPayPaymentDate, PaymentPlanInitialBalance, PaymentPlanAmountDue, PaymentPlanCurrentBalance, PaymentPlanMonthlyDue, PaymentPlanCurrentDue, GuarantorLastStatementDate, GuarantorNextStatementDate, GuarantorLastDemandStatementDate, GuarantorNoteExpirationDate

element.name: Account
element.documentation: Unique EPIC ID of the Account

element.name: Balance
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Balance

element.name: PreBilledBalance
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Pre-Billed balance on the account.

element.name: SelfPayBalance
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Self Pay balance.

element.name: InsuranceBalance
element.documentation: Hospital Billing insurance balance.

element.name: BadDebtBalance
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Bad Debt balance.

element.name: UndistributedBalance
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Undistributed balance

element.name: BadDebtSelfPayBalance
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Bad Debt in self pay balance

element.name: BadDebtInsuranceBalance
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Bad Debt in Insurance Balance

element.name: BadDebtUndistributedBalance
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Bad Debt Undistributed Balance

element.name: SelfPayAgingDate
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Self Pay aging date Oldest

element.name: InsuranceAgingDate
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Insurance aging date

element.name: LastInsurancePaymentDate
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Last Insurance payment date

element.name: LastSelfPayPaymentDate
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Last Self Pay payment date

element.name: PaymentPlanInitialBalance
element.documentation: Initial Amount Balance on Hospital Billing when Payment Plan starts.

element.name: PaymentPlanAmountDue
element.documentation: Current amount due on the Hospital Billing Payment Plan

element.name: PaymentPlanCurrentBalance
element.documentation: Current Balance on the Hospital Billing Payment Plan

element.name: PaymentPlanMonthlyDue
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Monthly Payment Plan due

element.name: PaymentPlanCurrentDue
element.documentation: Hospital Billing Current Amount due on the monthly Payment Plan

element.name: GuarantorLastStatementDate
element.documentation: Date the last statement sent to the Guarantor

element.name: GuarantorNextStatementDate
element.documentation: Date the next statement send to the Guarantor

element.name: GuarantorLastDemandStatementDate
element.documentation: Date of the last demand statement to be sent to the Guarantor

element.name: GuarantorNoteExpirationDate
element.documentation: Expiration date of the Billing Note for this guarantor account

group.name: ReleaseOfInformation
group.elementOrder: PatientAccount, Balance, RequesterTaxExempt, BillingHouseNumber, BillingDistrict, BillingAddressCounty
group.documentation: Grouping of Release Of Information elements.

element.name: PatientAccount
element.documentation: ROI Patient Account ? Y/N

element.name: Balance
element.documentation: ROI Balance - Only if Profee Billing is not used

element.name: BillingHouseNumber
element.documentation: House number of ROI billing address

element.name: BillingDistrict
element.documentation: District of ROI billing district

element.name: BillingAddressCounty
element.documentation: County Address of ROI Billing Address

element.name: RequesterTaxExempt
element.documentation: Release of information of this requester are tax exempt ?

group.name: PaymentPlan
group.elementOrder: StartDate, TotalAmount, Amount, Duration, Frequency, DayOfMonthDue, IsTimely, OnTime, LinkedToStatementDate

element.name: StartDate
element.documentation: Payment Plan start date

element.name: TotalAmount
element.documentation: Payment Plan total amount

element.name: Amount
element.documentation: Dollar amount to be paid through the Payment Plan

element.name: Duration
element.documentation: Payment plan duration

element.name: Frequency
element.documentation: Payment Frequency through the Payment Plan if selected (weekly, semi-monthly, Monthly etc)

element.name: DayOfMonthDue
element.documentation: Day of the month the Payment is due in Payment Plan

element.name: IsTimely
element.documentation: Payment is on time always ?

element.name: OnTime
element.documentation: Payment Plan effective until balance paid off ?

element.name: LinkedToStatementDate
element.documentation: Payment Plan due date is linked to statement date ?

element.name: AccountId
element.documentation: Client Account

element.name: Frequency
element.documentation: Client billing Frequency like weekly, monthly, bi-weekly

element.name: FrequencyDay
element.documentation: Client Billing weekday like Monday, Sunday, Tuesday etc.,

element.name: DayOfMonth
element.documentation: Client Billing day of the Month

element.name: NextStatementDate
element.documentation: Date of the next statement to be sent to Guarantor for Profee Billing Drop Cycle

element.name: ExternalSelfPayBalance
element.documentation: PB external self pay Balance

element.name: ExternalInsuranceBalance
element.documentation: PB external insurance Balance

list.name: Notes
list.documentation: Use this collection to capture notes related to a GuarantorAccount.

idsSpecification.name: GuarantorAccountNote
idsSpecification.elementOrder: AccountId, NotepadType, Summary, ActiveInactiveStatus, ExpirationDate, CreatedByUser, CreatedOnDate, Homed, Remote, Prioritized

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Guarantor Account Notes.

element.name: AccountId
element.documentation: Account ID associated with this Note

element.name: NotepadType
element.documentation: Notepad type (General, letter, Bill, Claim, Collection, insurance etc.,)

element.name: Summary
element.documentation: Short description of the Note

element.name: ActiveInactiveStatus
element.documentation: Note status Active / Inactive

element.name: ExpirationDate
element.documentation: Note expiry Date

element.name: CreatedByUser
element.documentation: User who created this note

element.name: CreatedOnDate
element.documentation: The date and time the note was created.

element.name: Homed
element.documentation: Noted Homed Y/ N ?

element.name: Remote
element.documentation: Remote Note Y/ N ?

element.name: Prioritized
element.documentation: The Note is prioritized y/ n ?

element.name: InvoiceStatementNumber
element.documentation: Invoice Number associated with this note

list.name: ContactHistory
list.documentation: Use this collection to capture contact history related to this GuarantorAccount.

idsSpecification.name: GuarantorAccountContactHistory
idsSpecification.elementOrder: OccurredNumbeOfTimes, ContactDate, RecordedByUser, CollectionStaffActivity, ReContactDate, CollectionAgencyLetterNumber, CollectionAgencyLetterLibrary, CollectionQueue, RecordedDate, AdditionalInformation, FollowupWorkQueueActivity, RefundRequestId, RefundRequestStatus, RefundRequestAmount, RefundRequesTransactionNumber, FollowupTransactions, FollowupCurrentInsuranceBalance, FollowupCurrentPatientBalance, FollowupTotalAttributedPaymentAmount, AccountType, FollowupInformationNeeded, FollowupWorkQueueId, SummaryOfLetterSent, LetterStatus, CollectionSubQueue, FollowupNote, LetterName, PaperlessMyChartBillingStatus

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Guarantor Account Notes.

element.name: OccurredNumbeOfTimes
element.documentation: Line number (No of times) this contact occurred

element.name: ContactDate
element.documentation: Contact date

element.name: RecordedByUser
element.documentation: User Id the person who recorded this contact

element.name: CollectionStaffActivity
element.documentation: Activity performed by the collection staff (Like - No contact, Check Mailed, Letter, Promised payment etc.,)

element.name: ReContactDate
element.documentation: The date the account should be contacted again

element.name: CollectionAgencyLetterNumber
element.documentation: Letter Number of the collection agency linked to this account

element.name: CollectionAgencyLetterLibrary
element.documentation: The breeze library where the collection letter can be found

element.name: CollectionQueue
element.documentation: Collection queue to which account belongs

element.name: RecordedDate
element.documentation: Date and Time the contact was recorded

element.name: AdditionalInformation
element.documentation: Any additional information about the contact

element.name: FollowupWorkQueueActivity
element.documentation: Followup activity work queue (Created, Updated, Denied, Note, transfer etc.,)

element.name: RefundRequestId
element.documentation: Refund Request Id

element.name: RefundRequestStatus
element.documentation: Refund request status (Submitted, reviewed, approved, rejected etc.,)

element.name: RefundRequestAmount
element.documentation: Amount the refund requested

element.name: RefundRequesTransactionNumber
element.documentation: Transaction Number of the Refund request

element.name: FollowupTransactions
element.documentation: Followup transactions

element.name: FollowupCurrentInsuranceBalance
element.documentation: Followup current insurance balance

element.name: FollowupCurrentPatientBalance
element.documentation: followup current patient balance

element.name: FollowupTotalAttributedPaymentAmount
element.documentation: Followup total attributed payment amount

element.name: AccountType
element.documentation: Based activity or Associated activity

element.name: FollowupInformationNeeded
element.documentation: Activity information to be displayed

element.name: FollowupWorkQueueId
element.documentation: Followup Work queue ID

element.name: SummaryOfLetterSent
element.documentation: Short summary of the letter sent

element.name: LetterStatus
element.documentation: letter status (Sent, printed etc.)

element.name: CollectionSubQueue
element.documentation: sub queue within the collection queue

element.name: FollowupNote
element.documentation: Followup Note

element.name: LetterName
element.documentation: name of the letter

element.name: PaperlessMyChartBillingStatus
element.documentation: Paperless my chart billing status

list.name: Coverages
list.documentation: Use this collection to capture the account coverages assigned to this GuarantorAccount.

idsSpecification.name: GuarantorAccountCoverage
idsSpecification.elementOrder: NumberOfCoverages, AccountId, ServiceArea, AccountType, LineNumber, Active, RecordId, FinancialClass, GuardianPatientRelationship, Episode, Comment, Description, PrimaryClaimId, Payer, BenefitPlan, Patient
idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Guarantor Account Notes.

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

element.name: NumberOfCoverages
element.documentation: Line Number (Multiple coverages a patient might have)

element.name: AccountId
element.documentation: Account Id associated with this Covergae

element.name: ServiceArea
element.documentation: Service Area to which this account belongs

element.name: AccountType
element.documentation: Type of Account (Family / Account / Worker compensation etc.,)

element.name: LineNumber
element.documentation: Line number of Account type

element.name: Active
element.documentation: Account Active ?

element.name: RecordId
element.documentation: Coverage record associated with this Patient / Account

element.name: FinancialClass
element.documentation: Financial Class of the account (like Self Pay, Medicare, Commerial, HMO etc)

element.name: GuardianPatientRelationship
element.documentation: Relationship between the Patient and Guarantor

element.name: Episode
element.documentation: Episode associated with this account

element.name: Comment
element.documentation: Free form comment

element.name: PrimaryClaimId
element.documentation: Patient's Primary Claim

element.name: Payer
element.documentation: payer associated with the coverage record

element.name: BenefitPlan
element.documentation: Benefit Plan associated with the coverage record

list.name: Transactions
list.documentation: Use this collection to capture the account coverages assigned to this GuarantorAccount.

idsSpecification.name: GuarantorAccountTransaction

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Guarantor Account Notes.
